Title: IoT Pharmaceutical AI Databases: Regulatory Compliance Meets Innovation
Abstract: Discover proven IoT database architectures that enable pharmaceutical labs to integrate thousands of connected devices with AI workflows while meeting FDA compliance, achieving 65% faster validation and unlocking $40-70B in industry savings.

Title: AI-Powered Assistants for Real-Time Decisions in IoT Manufacturing
Abstract: Discover how AI-powered Virtual Operator Assistants transform IoT data into real-time decisions on the factory floor—slashing downtime, speeding training, and empowering operators with instant, voice-driven insights.

Title: Silent invaders | Revealing the Dark Web's IoT Army
Abstract: IoT devices are prime cybercrime targets due to their vulnerabilities and value on the dark web. Adversarial AI escalates risks, enabling large-scale attacks. This paper highlights critical IoT weaknesses and calls for zero-tolerance security across the supply chain to ensure resilience.

Title: Sensors in Action: Research Lessons from IoT Prototypes and Experiments
Abstract: From lab experiments to embedded systems, I’ll share research-focused IoT projects where sensors, automation, and signal processing meet real-world challenges — uncovering lessons for building smarter, scalable, and reliable IoT systems.

Title: IoT Data Lakehouse: Scalable Architectures for Connected Device Analytics
Abstract: Learn how IoT Lakehouse architectures solve massive sensor data challenges by unifying streaming telemetry, device logs, and analytics in scalable platforms that power predictive maintenance, smart city monitoring, and connected device intelligence.

Title: IoT Supply Chain Security: Defending Connected Device Ecosystems from Cyberattacks
Abstract: Learn proven strategies to defend IoT ecosystems from supply chain cyberattacks. Discover how hardware attestation, network segmentation, and behavioral analytics can reduce IoT security incidents by 60%+ based on real-world data

Title: Do your gadgets have ears? Why IoT regulation must include data privacy
Abstract: Recent research by consumer body Which? even shows air fryers asking permission to record audio and consumer data sent to servers in China so do your appliances have ears? We look at whether enough is being done to restrict data capture and protect end user privacy.

Title: Optimizing IoT Messaging at Scale: Data-Driven Strategies for Low Latency, High Throughput, and Resilience
Abstract: Learn how IoT platforms achieve sub-100ms latency and scale to millions of devices with data-driven strategies in caching, load balancing, and anomaly detection delivering resilient, energy-efficient messaging at global scale.

Title: Banking-as-a-Service: APIs Powering IoT-Driven Financial Innovation
Abstract: Discover how Banking-as-a-Service (BaaS) turns banks into API-first platforms, enabling IoT devices, fintechs, and enterprises to embed payments and financial services seamlessly. Learn how APIs power the future of finance secure, scalable, and ready for the IoT era.

Title: AI-Driven Portfolio Management: Intelligent Automation for the Future of Wealth and IoT-Enabled Finance
Abstract: Discover how AI and IoT are revolutionizing wealth management. From deep learning–powered returns to IoT-driven insights, learn how intelligent automation transforms portfolios, cuts costs, and delivers personalized client experiences at scale.

Title: Edge AI for Smart Camera IoT Devices: Real-Time Image Processing Without Cloud Dependencies
Abstract: Transform dumb IoT cameras into intelligent edge devices! Learn how to deploy neural networks on $10 hardware, process images in real-time without cloud, save bandwidth, extend battery life, and protect privacy. From smart doorbells to industrial vision - make your IoT cameras think locally!

Title: AI-Powered IoT in Retail: Driving Efficiency and Customer-Centric Innovation
Abstract: Discover how AI-powered IoT is transforming retail faster checkouts, real-time insights, and hyper-personalized customer experiences. Learn practical strategies to boost efficiency, cut costs, and future-proof your retail operations with smart, data-driven innovation.

Title: IoT Data Warehousing with Snowflake Feature Stores: 40% Cost Reduction Strategy
Abstract: Transform IoT data chaos into ML-ready features using Snowflake. Learn proven patterns that cut costs 40% while scaling from edge sensors to cloud analytics. Real case studies show how unified architecture eliminates data silos and accelerates IoT model deployment.

Title: STEM in the Garden: How to Monitor Plants with IoT Sensors and Grafana Cloud
Abstract:
Are you a parent who wants to do a fun project with your kids? Are you trying to keep your plants alive? Or are you considering using an IoT device to monitor your plant's soil moisture level?

If any of the following resonates, this talk is for you!

Title: IoT-Driven Supply Chain Resilience: Event Architecture for Connected Retail
Abstract: Transform IoT chaos into competitive advantage! Learn battle-tested event-driven patterns that turn millions of retail sensor events into resilient, autonomous supply chain operations that scale reliably in production.

Title: IoT AI-Cloud Integration: Powering Next-Gen Operations & Edge Performance
Abstract: Learn battle-tested AI-cloud strategies transforming IoT operations: 99.97% prediction accuracy, 96.8% latency reduction, $4.67M savings. Get proven frameworks for edge-cloud architectures processing 1.38M IoT events/second.

Title: Secure IoT Edge Architecture: Predictive Maintenance for Medical Diagnostic Systems
Abstract: Real IoT deployment: 157 medical devices, 97.8% uptime, $437K savings, 91.3% failure prediction accuracy. Edge computing + ML + Zero Trust security = proven results. Learn the architecture that transformed healthcare maintenance operations.

JobTitle1: Driving Strategic Growth for Global Customers
Title: Taming IoT Data Streams: Lessons in Managing Scale, Complexity, and Trust
Abstract: IoT devices generate massive streams of data, but the challenge is making that data reliable, secure, and usable at scale. Engineers face messy pipelines, outages, and governance needs. By improving how we manage streaming systems like Kafka, teamsfocus on building IoT apps that deliver real impact.

Title: Bridging the gap: testing strategies for cloud-connected embedded systems
Abstract: Discover how to effectively test cloud-connected embedded systems! Learn strategies to overcome integration challenges, avoid duplicate effort, and leverage HIL and focused system testing to ensure robust, seamless interaction between embedded and cloud components.

Title: Lakehouse Architecture: Scaling Real-Time Data for IoT Transformation
Abstract: Unlock the power of IoT data at scale! Discover how Lakehouse Architecture fuses the speed of data lakes with the reliability of warehouses to deliver real-time insights, lower costs, and AI-driven decisions for the hyper-connected future.

Title: IoT Health Framework: 4-Dimension Assessment Cuts Device Incidents 42%
Abstract: Learn a proven 4-dimension framework that reduced IoT device incidents by 42% across 15 enterprise deployments. Discover how to move beyond reactive monitoring to proactive IoT ecosystem health optimization with quantifiable results.

Title: Graph-Powered IoT Digital Twins with Databricks and Neo4j
Abstract: We’ll explore how to combine Databricks Lakehouse for scalable IoT telemetry with Neo4j Graph DB for modeling device topologies and dependencies.

Title: IoT Payment Systems: Microservices Architecture for Connected Devices
Abstract: Learn how payment gateways evolved from monoliths to microservices to handle billions of IoT device transactions, enabling real-time processing with 99.99% uptime and 40% cost reduction through scalable, cloud-native architectures.

Title: Explainable Automation in IoT Compliance: Building Trust, Transparency, and Resilience
Abstract: IoT systems face rising regulatory scrutiny. This talk shows how explainable automation builds transparency into connected devices and pipelines, strengthening compliance, accelerating audits, and boosting trust without slowing innovation.

JobTitle1: Technology Consulting Manager - FSO AI & Data
Title: AI-Driven Automation in IoT Data Compliance: Enhancing Accuracy, Efficiency, and Trust through Advanced Analytics
Abstract: Discover how AI transforms IoT compliance! Learn how automation, predictive analytics, and NLP can turn massive IoT data into accurate, efficient, and regulation-ready insights reducing risk while boosting ROI and innovation.

JobTitle1: Senior Principal Engineer – Kubernetes, Containers & DevOps | Oracle CNE | Oracle Cloud (OCI)
Title: IoT Infrastructure: How Declarative & Immutable Patterns Reduce Cloud Waste
Abstract: Discover how declarative & immutable infrastructure patterns help IoT teams cut cloud waste by 45%, reduce carbon emissions, and improve device reliability—with real case studies and actionable implementation strategies.

Title: Decoupling Legacy Banking: Modular Core Strategies for Speed, Scale, and Innovation
Abstract: Legacy banking systems drain budgets and block innovation. Learn how modular core architectures slash costs, cut outages by 70%+, and triple feature delivery quipping banks to scale, innovate, and thrive in the digital era.

Title: NiFI Man: “We're here – but should we have come?”
Abstract: Lets track everything near us with sensors and more

Title: AI-Driven IoT Operations: Autonomous Multi-Agent Systems for Smart Infrastructure
Abstract: Learn how AI multi-agent systems are revolutionizing IoT operations, achieving 42% faster incident resolution and 89% autonomous remediation while maintaining human oversight in production environments.

Title: IoT Zoned Storage: SMR & ZNS Solutions for Edge Data Centers
Abstract: Discover how breakthrough SMR and ZNS zoned storage technologies solve critical IoT data challenges, delivering 25-30% capacity gains and predictable performance for edge deployments while reducing operational costs.
